DOC.HEADLINE: FRANCE CAPTURES A TOP TURKISH LEFTIST TERRORIST
DOC.TEXT: The fugitive leader of Turkey ' s most violent leftist underground group was captured by police after entering France from Italy using false identity papers . Mehmet Agar , the chief of Turkish police , confirmed Sunday that Dursun Karatas was arrested Saturday in Modane , France . Agar said Turkey would apply today for Karatas ' extradition , the Anatolia news_agency reported . Karatas fled an Istanbul prison in 1989 .
